name: family-legacy-api
description: API for Family Legacy web and mobile application

scripts.setup: mkdir -p $HOME$npm_package_venv_dir/Scripts && python -m venv $HOME$npm_package_venv_dir && touch $HOME$npm_package_venv_dir/Scripts/activate_this.py && source $HOME$npm_package_venv_dir/bin/activate && pip install -Ur requirements/development.txt

author: Sudaraka Wijesinghe <sudaraka@sudaraka.org> (http://sudaraka.org/)
